name: Ollie Pop - 8Bit Retro Skateboarding
description:
Have you got what it takes to beat Ollie Pop - 8Bit Retro Skateboarding?

Finally an infinite skateboarding game for the pro gamer with lightning fast twitch skills.


Features:
- 8Bit / Retina mashup Graphics
- Easy to pick up, difficult to master, totally addictive.
- Simple Controls - hold to charge your jump and let go to Pop your Ollie
- Addictive gameplay, just one more go!
- Earn bragging rights. Accumulate huge amounts of in game cash, who will be the first Ollie Pop millionaire?
- Grab your Skateboard, and test your skills with infinite gameplay possibilities

Credits:
Music by TEKNOAXE http://teknoaxe.com. Dollar sprite by Pixelblock http://pixelblock.tumblr.com
